title: Food Allergy
content:
Food allergy is an abnormal response to a food triggered by your body’s immune system. Even a tiny amount of the allergy-causing food can trigger signs and symptoms such as digestive problems, itching, diarrhea, vomiting or swollen lips, face and throat. For other people it can also be life-threatening. The majority of food allergies are caused by proteins in some foods like shellfish, peanuts, eggs, walnuts etc.
